title: Would it be a bad thing to reduce the price on all runes by half?
body:
Because it takes 6300 ip to buy a new page, and some runes cost 6300 ip (mostly quints). Why do people have to save up the price of one and more champions for runes. 

I've been playing for 3yrs and i still don't have all the runes that i want, so i don't know how newer players will have the time to farm the ip for their runes and rune pages.

replies.body: Would probably make the people that worked hard for their rune pages get upset like I mean really pissed. I would be if I bought something and the next day it's on sale for 50% with no partial refund.

> [{quoted}](name=Coolxwdude,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yrv48BON,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-15T01:44:29.423+0000)
>
> Would probably make the people that worked hard for their rune pages get upset like I mean really pissed. I would be if I bought something and the next day it's on sale for 50% with no partial refund.

True, but Riot always announce price reductions in advance so people can wait before they make any purchase. Players will lose ip if they bought some runes a small time before the announcement, but that is unavoidable. If we want to better the game for the currently and new players, sometimes existing players will get the short end of the stick. But it is not so bad because now everyone would be able to get the remaining runes that they do not have twice as fast.
